setting.primary_location: Boston, Massachusetts - Beacon Hill neighborhood and downtown
setting.atmosphere: Cold, precise, intellectual - emphasis on logic over emotion

murder_method.description: Victim appears to have died of natural causes (cardiac arrest)
murder_method.constraint: No physical evidence of foul play exists
murder_method.truth: Sophisticated poison that mimics natural death and degrades within 48 hours

detection_rules.timeline_strict: All events must follow realistic timelines
detection_rules.witness_reliability: Witnesses can lie, misremember, or have agendas

rules.technology_level: Current era - smartphones, digital forensics, surveillance cameras, but no sci-fi tech

tone: Cerebral, methodical, with underlying tension. Think classic locked-room mystery meets modern forensic procedural.
